resources.string: Correctly unscramble and type as many sentences as you can before the timer runs out!
Every sentence that you get correct gives you +100 points. If you can get the correct sentence in half or three quarters of the given time, you will get a +50 and +25 time bonus!
After each round, the phrases you have correctly unscrambled will be displayed. Click on them to see its meaning and example and click the heart to save it to your favourites.
